Package gamePackage

Class Human

java.lang.Object
gamePackage.Player
gamePackage.Human
public class Human extends Player
The Human class represents a player that is a human player. This allows the human player to be identified and make decisions.
Version:
15.01.2025
Author:
Anne McCubbin
